t: Need replacement cover for canyon ridge fire bowl 65223 ...
s: I need a new "PROTECTOR, which is located inside the circle of the round burner, as it is rotting away. Cannot find replacement parts on the net. The model #67384 is not that old yet. I'm going to try and call allen+roth who make the Canyon Ridge Firebowl, Model #67384, 1-866-439-9800, 8 a.m.
